 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעַן‎</span>] **verb** ==wander, travel== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***journey, go away***; probably connected with Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒênu***</u></abbr>, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טְעַן‎</span>, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טען‎</span>, all ***load*** (beast, etc.) = Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טָעַן‎</span> [[Gen.45.17|Gen 45:17]] Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טְעַן‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> also ***bear, carry***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְעָן‎</span> [[Isa.33.20|Isa 33:20]] ***travel***, i. e. be removed, of tent (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִסַּע‎</span>).
